148.heading: Stops.
148.title: "Trashman, Agent of the 6th International"
148.author: drawn by Spain ; written by Algernon Backwash

149.title: "Stops at Nothing"
149.author: [No author]

notes: Begins: Say, Slat, I got a zero in my examination.
